Hades/Anbuis/Koga Shuko/Unitron/Bumblebee/Scattershot/Punch/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Dark One/Pyro:



::Shuko grunted as Zardus' shots dug into his back, the Predacon turning, 
firing off a few shots at Zardus from his rifle, falling back onto his 
boulder from Zardus' shots::

::Anubis raised his rifle to try and block Bloodstrike's sword, yelling as 
bolts tore into his skin, with a flick of his wrist, 8 inch claws came out of 
his fingertips.  He then slashed the metallic claws at Blood's gut::

::Hades notices Zergling, and how Zergling didn't stop coming or take cover::
::Raising his rifle, he fired off two laser bolts before jumping back through 
the air, landing 8 ft away to try and avoid the blade::

::Unitron laughed Perndabot started shooting him::
"All that does not follow us, will become one with the VOID!" ::He yells, 
trying to ignore the pain, firing off a missile from his missile launcher off 
at Perdnabot's abdomen (region stomach is at), firing off three bolts from 
his rifle at Bloodstrike's back::

::Scattershot yelled loudly like a frightened woman (faking it though), 
flying to the right through the air from DevilDuer's shots, pulling out a 
charge set to explode on impact from subspace, dropping it down at DevilDuer, 
yelling in real pain as autogun fire began to hit him, Scattershot lifting 
off::

::Punch looked around the battlefield for a moment::
"Hmmm...time for me to get in good with the group's leader..."
::Charging forward, he stopped abruptly, bringing his fist back, the figure 
in front of him, Unitron, turned, a roundhouse kick sending Punch spinning 
for a few seconds, hitting stomach on a 5 ft high boulder.  Getting up 
slowly, he charged forward, but he slipped, landing on his back.  Reaching 
around the area he had slipped, he produced a 6 in long fang::
"Wh-"
::Unitron rabbed him by his neck, lifting him into the air, already scanning 
the fang::
"Hmmm...not of nature." he said softly as he headbutted Punch, taking the 
fang, putting it into subspace, and then throwing the worthless Alliance dog 
to the ground, firing a missile at the Alliance base, yelping as autogun fire 
struck his heavily armored body::

=========================

::Bumblebee lifted off into the air as he was ordered, screaming as he saw 
the awesome sight that was Ra, raising his two stinger missile launchers, he 
continued to pull on the triggers, opening fire upon Ra, hoping to stop the 
juggernaught or at least knock him off course so he could run like Slag::

=========================

::Nemesis looked back and forth from Skywarp, Dirge, and Ramjet, trying to 
decide on who should be the leader of their small gestalt team::
"Errr...you...a...well...gee..."

::Dark One backhanded Nemesis to the side::
"Vile servant, begone!  You," he said, pointing to Skywarp, "will be the 
temporary leader until we get back to base and our leader decides who should 
be your team leader.  So follow us!"

::Nemesis opened a comlink to Zardus::
<Zardus, Nemesis, we have recruited the three robots.  We are returning to 
base.  Though they are having some quarrels on who should be leader.  Nemesis 
out>

::Finishing that up, Nemesis, Pyro, and Dark One (and most likely DeathStorm) 
headed in the direction of the Alliance Base, going at a moderate pace::
